movies.overview: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a 'Super-Soldier serum.' But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.
movies.title: Captain America: The First Avenger

movies.overview: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.
movies.title: Captain Marvel

movies.overview: Tony Stark builds an armored suit and becomes the technologically advanced superhero Iron Man.
movies.title: Iron Man

movies.overview: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper.
movies.title: The Incredible Hulk

movies.overview: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.
movies.title: Iron Man 2

movies.overview: Thor, the God of Thunder, is banished from Asgard and must learn humility before he can reclaim his powers.
movies.title: Thor

movies.overview: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
movies.title: The Avengers

movies.overview: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.
movies.title: Iron Man 3

movies.overview: Thor must confront the gods to the gods when Asgard is threatened with Ragnarok, the Norse apocalypse.
movies.title: Thor: The Dark World

movies.overview: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.
movies.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier

movies.overview: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.
movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy

movies.overview: The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mystery of Peter Quill's true parentage.
movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2

movies.overview: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plans.
movies.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron

movies.overview: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.
movies.title: Ant-Man

movies.overview: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.
movies.title: Captain America: Civil War

movies.overview: Natasha Romanoff confronts her past and the dark conspiracy of the Red Room while on the run as a fugitive.
movies.title: Black Widow

movies.overview: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man.
movies.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming

movies.overview: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.
movies.title: Black Panther

movies.overview: Dr. Stephen Strange, a brilliant but arrogant surgeon, gets a new lease on life when a sorcerer takes him under her wing and trains him to defend the world against evil.
movies.title: Doctor Strange

movies.overview: Imprisoned on the other side of the universe, the mighty Thor finds himself in a deadly gladiatorial contest that pits him against the Hulk, his former ally and fellow Avenger.
movies.title: Thor: Ragnarok

movies.overview: Scott Lang teams up with Hope van Dyne as the new Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.
movies.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp

movies.overview: As the Avengers face a new cosmic threat from Thanos, they must stop him from collecting all six Infinity Stones.
movies.title: Avengers: Infinity War

movies.overview: The Avengers, along with allies, must assemble once more to undo Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe.
movies.title: Avengers: Endgame

movies.overview: Peter Parker faces new challenges as he teams up with Mysterio to stop the Elementals and uncover the truth about mysterious attacks.
movies.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home

movies.overview: The Eternals, a race of immortal beings, reunite to protect Earth from their evil counterparts, the Deviants.
movies.title: Eternals

movies.overview: Shang-Chi must confront the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.
movies.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings

movies.overview: Doctor Strange has to unravel the multiverse's mysteries, unleashing powerful adversaries and threatening the fabric of reality.
movies.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness

movies.overview: Thor must confront the consequences of his actions as a new threat emerges, endangering both Asgard and Earth.
movies.title: Thor: Love and Thunder

movies.overview: The sequel to Black Panther explores the world of Wakanda and its new protector.
movies.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever

movies.overview: The Guardians of the Galaxy embark on another cosmic adventure.
movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3

movies.overview: Carol Danvers, aka Captain Marvel, has reclaimed her identity from the tyrannical Kree and taken revenge on the Supreme Intelligence. But unintended consequences see Carol shouldering the burden of a destabilized universe. When her duties send her to an anomalous wormhole linked to a Kree revolutionary, her powers become entangled with that of Jersey City super-fan Kamala Khan, aka Ms. Marvel, and Carol’s estranged niece, now S.A.B.E.R. astronaut Captain Monica Rambeau. Together, this unlikely trio must team up and learn to work in concert to save the universe.
movies.title: The Marvels

movies.overview: Peter Parker is unmasked and no longer able to separate his normal life from the high-stakes of being a super-hero. When he asks for help from Doctor Strange the stakes become even more dangerous, forcing him to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.
movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
